name: Billy Beaver
conditionImmune: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned

trait.name: Keen Sight and Smell
text: Billy Beaver has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight or smell.

action.name: Beak
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 10 (1d10 + 5) piercing damage.

description: Source: The Lost Dungeon of Rickedness: Big Rick Energy p. 27
